name: upload
description: type of upload: a zip file or an R object

name: tool
description: tool used to process the raw MS files: Spectronaut or MaxQuant

name: assay
description: selects the type of assay: phosphoproteomic or proteomic

name: getFP
description: if the samples are enriched or non-enriched

name: getPP
description: if the samples are enriched or non-enriched

name: ifNormCorrect
description: apply the normalization correction method (only applicable for phosphoproteomics data)

name: transform
description: select the tranformation method

name: normalize
description: if normalization is desired or not

name: missFilter
description: percentage of missing values allowed

name: outliers
description: list of all the sample outliers to be removed for further analysis/exploration

name: impute
description: select the imputation method

name: colorBox
description: color the box-plot based on the selected annotation

name: xaxisPCA
description: principal component on x-axis

name: yaxisPCA
description: principal component on y-axis

name: colorPCA
description: color the points based on the selected annotation

name: shapePCA
description: shape the points based on the selected annotation

name: chooseType
description: select the type of heatmap: most-variant genes, differentially expressed genes or genes from cluster

name: numGenes
description: number of top-variant genes

name: seleCluster
description: selected cluster number

name: numClustCol
description: number of custers, the columns of the heatmap should be divided into

name: numClustRow
description: number of clusters, the rows of the heatmap should be divided into

name: colAnnoHM
description: additional column annotations for the heatmap

name: seleID1
description: reference group ID(s)

name: Treat1
description: reference treatment condition(s)

name: Time1
description: reference timepoint(s)

name: seleID2
description: target group ID(s)

name: Treat2
description: target treatment condition(s)

name: Time2
description: target timepoint(s)

name: deMethod
description: select differential expression method: limma or ProDA

name: ifAdjusted
description: if adjusted pValue should be used for filtering

name: fcFilter
description: log fold-change value for filtering

name: pFilter
description: p value for filtering

name: geneID
description: last clicked gene ID

name: geneSymbol
description: last clicked gene symbol
